/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from the sidewalk, looking out towards the street. The street is flanked by a white bridge on the right and a serene lake on the left. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. The trees lining the street are lush and green, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The overall scene is a blend of urban and natural elements, creating a harmonious balance.
